mapper.select: SELECT u.stu_num as num, u.NAME as name, sum( a.ac ) as ac, GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT( a.reason, ' : ', a.ac ) SEPARATOR '\n' ) as reason FROM `user` u INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ac_record WHERE YEAR ( create_time ) = #{year} AND MONTH ( create_time ) = #{month} ) a ON a.user_id = u.id AND u.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY u.id
